name: Mochi Making Mischief
description:
Tewi has divised a plan to make mochi on the moon and sell it to the inhabitants of Gensokyo for New Year... But of course Reisen will be the one on the spotlight. With Seiran's mochi hammering skills they will (attempt to) make the best mochi the universe has ever seen. If the mochi's not good though, Reisen will have to take responsability for this.

Make sure to follow the game's artist Aurora on Twitter at @CynicalRyuins

Sound effects and music credits and sources:

https://taira-komori.jpn.org/freesounden.html

https://opengameart.org/content/curious-critters

https://freesound.org/people/davidbain/sounds/135831/

https://freesound.org/people/mouse85224/sounds/371205/

Music from https://filmmusic.io

"Mischief Maker" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)

"Krampus's Workshop" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)

"Fun in a Bottle" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
